question:
Who among the following were associated with All India Kisan Sabha?
1. N.G. Ranga
2. E.M.S. Namboodiripad
3. Jayaprakash Narayan
4. Acharya Narendra Dev
Choose the correct option from the codes given below:
explanation: Sahajanand Saraswati was the first president of All India Kisan Sabha which was established at the Lucknow session of the Indian National Congress in 1936. The persons associated with the organization were N.G. Ranga, E.M.S. Namboodiripad, Jayaprakash Narayan, Acharya Narendra Dev, P. Sundarayya, Ram Manohar Lohia.
